about_the_game:
Welcome to Death Carnival, the Intense Top-Down Shooter with multi-elevation combat. Easy to start, thrilling to watch. Insane assortment of weapons & characters, and a controller-smashing experience that will leave you hungry for more. Play story campaign solo, co-op with friends, or destroy everyone in PvP. Cross-platform and packed with spectator and party modes so the fun never ends.  Choose from over a dozen characters each with unique attacks and story campaigns.

Story:

In a future world, broken by war, humanity survives in a few overcrowded cities. To escape their bleak reality, many turn to televised blood sports, the most popular being Death Carnival. In this deadly game show, contestants must battle against hordes of enemies and machines for fame and fortune on live TV.

Features:

  • Exciting PvP combat in various objective-based maps

  • Easy arcade-style controls with multi-elevation intense combat

  • Customize your experience with characters, loadouts and cards

  • Stackable card ability system to endlessly customize your builds

  • Story campaign solo or 4 players couch/online co-op

  • Spanning multiple worlds and multitude of arenas

  • Giant boss fights and plenty of endgame infinite replay

  • Dedicated live streaming features

  • Cross-platform, Cross-Progression, will be available on most platforms
